text: Anas Sarwar (born 14 March 1983) is a Scottish Labour Party politician who has been the Leader of the Scottish Labour Party since 2021. He has been a Member of the Scottish Parliament (MSP) for the Glasgow region since 2016, having been Member of Parliament (MP) for Glasgow Central from 2010 to 2015. At the 2024 United Kingdom general election, the Labour won with a landslide victory, winning 411 seats across the United Kingdom, with Scottish Labour winning 37 of the 57 Scottish seats in what was also seen as a landslide. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:UK MPs 2010â€“2015 Category:Politicians from Glasgow
title: Anas Sarwar
